meanings.definition: A person who does not eat or use animal products.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a vegan and only eats plant-based foods.
meanings.sent2: The vegan brought a delicious tofu dish to the potluck.
meanings.sent3: Why did the vegan bring a carrot to the party? To have a 'root'ing good time!
meanings.sent4: Her commitment to being a vegan is as strong as oak.
meanings.sent5: The vegan's dedication to animal welfare is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Relating to or suitable for vegans.
meanings.sent1: The vegan restaurant offers a variety of plant-based options.
meanings.sent2: She bought vegan cosmetics that were not tested on animals.
meanings.sent3: Why did the vegan refuse to play cards? Because they were dealing with a 'full deck' of animal products!
meanings.sent4: The vegan lifestyle is a beacon of compassion in a world of indifference.
meanings.sent5: The vegan label on the product assured her it was cruelty-free.
